attributes.action: Reinstate the e-mail the PM facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The No10 website recently removed the facility to e-mail the PM.  This is a vital, modern day tool whereby the public can actually voice their concerns to the PM in real time.  As such, it should be reinstated.

rejection.details:
The email facility has been removed temporarily for essential work. 
There are a variety of channels that you can still use to communicate with the Prime Minister until the email is working again.
http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
and the Youtube channel: http://uk.youtube.com/DowningSt
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
